titleStmt.title: Theavrauiohn high priest to the Ievves, his disputive challenge to the universities of Oxford and Cambridge, and the whole hirach. of Roms clargical priests.
titleStmt.author: Tany, Thomas, fl. 1649-1655.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Madan.
With an engraving of a sword and Tany's arms on page [8].
A ranting discourse by a half-witted man, of no importance. -- Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
